com.opera.core.systems.scope.services

Interface Core

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScopeCore

    public interface Core
extends Service
    Core utility service exposing metadata about the browser core in general, i.e. information which can not be associated to any one window, document, or object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SERVICE_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • getCoreVersion

        String getCoreVersion()
        Which Core version this instance is running, e.g. "2.8.119".
        Returns:
        version number

      • getOperatingSystem

        String getOperatingSystem()
        Gets a string which describes the operating system the connected Opera instance is running on. An example would be "Window NT 6.1"
        Returns:
        operating system

      • getProduct

        String getProduct()
        A string which describes the product. For regular desktop builds this will be "desktop". Other examples are "mobile" and "gogi".
        Returns:
        product type

      • getBinaryPath

        String getBinaryPath()
        The full path of the currently running binary.
        Returns:
        path

      • getUserAgent

        String getUserAgent()
        Gets the User-Agent string, typically something like "Opera/9.80 (Windows NT 6.1; U; en) Presto/2.7.62 Version/11.01"
        Returns:
        user agent

      • getProcessID

        Integer getProcessID()
        Gets the process ID of connected Opera instance. Might not be present if the build does not support retrieving process ID's.
        Returns:
        pid, or null if not available

      • clearPrivateData

        void clearPrivateData(List<com.opera.core.systems.scope.protos.CoreProtos.ClearFlags> flags)
        Clears specified browser data.
        Parameters:
        flags - list of private data to be cleared
